content: this crochet pattern is for a heart bookmark materials light weight #3 cotton yarn finished size about 11 28 cm long but you can make your bookmark of any length you like skill level easy language english the pattern uses crochet us terms free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/heart-bookmark-crochet-pattern/ product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external web sites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
